title: Our favorite spy-themed extraction shooter is having a free weekend to launch its second season
description: Deceive Inc will be free to play from July 27-30, and it's on sale too.

title: Starfield persuasion guide: Talking your way out of a space jam
description: Everything we know so far about Starfield's dialogue system, persuasion, speech challenges, and how they work.

title: The protagonist of this ultra-bleak horror game fights with sadness and gets upgrades by having an avoidant personality
description: Unholy is as sullen as it is janky.

title: A year and a half later and the Steam Deck's trackpads are finally being copied in a new handheld PC
description: The Ayaneo Kun is the big boi handheld gaming PC, with a chonky battery, and an 8.4-inch 1600p screen for "semi-mobile scenarios."

title: Sorry, Doom dreamers: John Carmack wishes John Romero 'the best' but they're not working on a secret new project together
description: Carmack said Romero's new autobiography reminds him of the glory days when they were "the 3D game hackers."

title: ESRB says proposed age verification scan is misunderstood: It doesn't 'confirm the identity of users' and is unrelated to videogame age ratings
description: The ESRB's proposed Privacy-Protective Facial Age Estimation system came to light yesterday through an FTC filing.

title: Dave the Diver was inspired by a real oceanside seafood restaurant… and Metal Gear Solid
description: Game Director Jaeho Hwang tells us what games influenced Dave the Diver, which include Mystery Dungeon and Yakuza.

title: The best thing about Diablo 4 is that it has stopped me from playing Destiny 2
description: The only thing that can break the spell of one live service looter is another live service looter.

title: Every Baldur's Gate 3 romance option: who you can pursue
description: Unlock a romance with any of the main origin characters and some of your other party members, too.

title: Armored Core 6 has a 120 fps option, a FromSoftware first on PC
description: Glorious mechs, glorious frames.

title: This fan-made UE5 remake of The Simpsons: Hit & Run looks incredible, and we'll never, ever get to play it
description: D'oh!

title: FromSoftware made Elden Ring and Armored Core 6 with a staff of just 300 developers
description: The maker of last year's biggest game remains modestly sized by triple-A standards.

title: Drop Lord of the Rings Dwarvish ENTR
description: Sturdy and gorgeously decorated, but a pretty basic feature set under all that finery.

title: Starfield's surprise anime series features battling mechs and fans are hoping they'll be playable in the game
description: The Settled Systems – A Starfield Animated Anthology is a series of three animated shorts that sets the mood for Bethesda's upcoming RPG.

title: The Banished Vault trapped me in a logistics nightmare and made me hate space, but I still really want to like it
description: Is this a turn-based space survival game or maths homework?

title: How to complete A Prayer for Salvation in Diablo 4
description: Help Cormond collect three mysterious objects from across Hawezar.

title: Charisma reigns supreme in D&D—the golden child Paladin might just be the most popular class in Baldur's Gate 3
description: A fan poll saw all four charisma-based classes hitting the top of the charts.

title: Armored Core 6 is even more like classic Armored Core than I thought
description: Short missions, tons of customization and a lock-on system that straddles the old and the new.

title: Armored Core 6 will have 1v1 duels and 3v3 multiplayer that's like a 'mecha festival with metal flying everywhere'
description: Despite focusing on singleplayer, FromSoftware still gave Armored Core PvP a bit of love.

title: Armored Core 6 isn't Robot Souls, or Elden Mech, and now I'm fine with that
description: FromSoftware's imminent mech fighter is its own unique, glorious thing.

title: Where to find the laser crystal in The Expanse
description: Surely this will come in handy in later episodes.

title: Why does it seem like PC ports are getting worse?
description: Developers tell us it isn't a PC port problem, it's a videogame development problem. Here's why b0rked releases keep happening.

title: Call of Duty devs get cheeky after Modern Warfare 3 leaks via an energy drink promotion
description: War makes Monsters of us all.

title: The Expanse proves that Telltale is back, baby, and recapturing some of that Walking Dead magic
description: It's like Telltale never went away.

title: Nerfs aside, one of Diablo 4's strongest Necro builds is even better this season
description: Bid farewell to Bone Spear and say hello to Infinimist.

title: Yoshi-P speaks out on Final Fantasy 16 toxicity: 'There's a lot of people who just yell at you'
description: A recent documentary went into the Final Fantasy 16 producer's life, work, and the difficulty in facing overly personal criticism.

title: AMD's Zen 2 chips have a security bug that's getting patched between now and 2024
description: Zenbleed shouldn't be left exposed for long, so you best keep an eye out for an upcoming AGESA fix for affected chips.

title: Remnant 2 review
description: This looter shooter sequel makes subverting expectations a habit.

title: Cableless GPUs are a new step in graphics card evolution
description: Asus' innovative cable-free graphics cards going into mass production before the end of the year.

title: Your Diablo 4 stash is tiny because a bigger one would fry your PC: 'This isn't a storage concern, it's a performance concern'
description: Unless you have a PC capable of loading in other players' infinite stashes, I guess.

title: After 200 hours and 44 pages of speculation, one Starfield fan thinks they've found all there is to know about the game's abilities
description: When Todd Howard is silent, the detectives come out to play.

title: You can vote to get this massive song made with Counter Strike gunshots into CS:GO
description: Made by music maker Vengent with little more than in-game samples.

title: AMD's RX 7900 GRE is coming to China, but what's under the hood?
description: The Golden Rabbit Edition is coming.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #766: Tuesday, July 25
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.

title: AMD 3D V-Cache CPUs are coming to laptops, and they'll contend for the gaming crown
description: It's about time!

title: One of Dave The Diver's boss monsters may return in a future update
description: One of the undersea bosses you defeat slips away, but it may someday return to fight you again.
